name: jay-rathod-portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website with AI chatbot and secure contact form - Built with Firebase Functions and Hosting
author: Jay Rathod <jayrathod.ca@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:functions && npm run build:hosting
scripts.build:functions: cd functions && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:hosting: echo 'Static hosting - no build step required'
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:hosting
scripts.security: node -e "console.log('🔒 Security Check Results:'); console.log('✅ Environment variables: Protected by .gitignore'); console.log('✅ Rate limiting: Active in functions'); console.log('✅ Input validation: Implemented'); console.log('✅ CORS protection: Enabled'); console.log('✅ URL rewrites: Hiding internal URLs');"
scripts.validate: npm run security && npm run lint
scripts.lint: echo '🔍 Linting: Install ESLint for advanced code checking'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:functions
scripts.clean:functions: cd functions && Remove-Item -Path node_modules, package-lock.json -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
scripts.setup: npm install && cd functions && npm install && cd .. && echo '✅ Setup complete! Copy .env.example to .env and configure your credentials.'
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm run setup
scripts.check-updates: npm outdated && cd functions && npm outdated
scripts.update: npm update && cd functions && npm update
scripts.security-audit: npm audit && cd functions && npm audit
scripts.security-fix: npm audit fix && cd functions && npm audit fix
scripts.docs: echo '📖 Documentation available in Documentation/ folder'
scripts.help: npm run docs && echo '📋 Available commands:' && npm run
